original_text: The third generation of their descendants can join with the Lord's people when they meet together to worship him.
korean_text: 그들의 삼 대 후 자손은 여호와의 총회에 들어올 수 있느니라

sentences.original_text: The third generation of their descendants
can join with the Lord's people
when they meet together to worship him
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 경배하기 위해 함께 모일 때
